results.title: New Approach For Simvastatin As An Antibacterial: Synergistic Effect With Bio-Synthesized Silver Nanoparticles Against Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria
results.text_hl: The combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and AgNPbio demonstrated antibacterial activity against @SPECIES_562 @@@Escherichia coli@@@ producing @<m>DISEASE_Ataxia_Neuropathy_Spectrum</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C579922 @@@ESBL@@@.

citations.NLM: Figueiredo EP, Ribeiro JM, Nishio EK, Scandorieiro S, Costa AF, Cardozo VF, Oliveira AG, Durán N, Panagio LA, Kobayashi R, Nakazato G. New Approach For Simvastatin As An Antibacterial: Synergistic Effect With Bio-Synthesized Silver Nanoparticles Against Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria Int J Nanomedicine. 2019;14():7975-7985. PMID: 31632012
